trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Fishers
There were no other sightings in Fishers on or around July 9th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and I decided to meet in Fishers, IN because we wanted to see each other, and this was a good half-way point. She asked me to meet her at a "reserve" kind of place, and I got there before she did. Honestly, I began talking to spirits(of which I do), and taking pictures. But, I had recalled someone saying, "If you want to see a ufo, just point the cameras up"..so, I did, and the very first thing I seen, was this dark sphere. I figured balloon, and thought, "I'll go ahead and get it on video if I can...so I did. It's so far away, so I'm not sure what it is. Strange thing, and not sure if this COULD be connected; however, earlier I was doing EVP work @ a cemetery and received a "Class A" EVP(anyone can make out without enhancement); which is rare. Then, I was taking photos inside of a tomb, thru a small window...WITH NO FLASH...and got a VERY nice orb. Then, while waiting on Dani, I happened to catch this object in the sky. I reviewed it on my Window Movie Maker software to view it frame by frame; and got one shot that even shows a few different colors "possibly" I'm not trying to cry wolf here, just not sure WHAT EXACTLY it is.
Summary: sitting @ a park waiting on girlfriend. I had my camera and took some pics; then thougt I'd take shots of the sky randomly, and the VERY FIRST thing I saw, was this sphere that was dark in color, so I began to shoot video.
